snippet.title: As We Descend - Official Announcement Trailer
snippet.description:
Play the demo on Steam right now: https://store.steampowered.com/app/3256480/As_We_Descend_Demo/?utm_source=youtube&utm_campaign=announcement_trailer&utm_medium=video

Wishlist on Steam now: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1769830/As_We_Descend/?utm_source=youtube&utm_campaign=announcement_trailer&utm_medium=video

As We Descend is a roguelike deckbuilder with the soul of a strategy game. Find salvation for the last City of humankind, and descend all the way to the core.

Leave your question and thoughts below!

Sign up for beta and news here: http://AsWeDescend.com

You can also follow us here:
https://twitter.com/boxdragongames
https://twitter.com/aswedescendgame
